comments.comment: Methuma gana nirdaya wiwechana ellakarana obathumala rata wenuwen minissu wenuwen karala thiyena sewayath poddak kiyannako. Tharaha ganna epa mn nodanna nisai ahanne. Eth eka deyaknam pahadiliwa kiyanna ona. English ba kiyala apahasa karannenam ape rata hooragena kalal watina dewal godak winasa karapu mankollakara minimaru sudu adirajyawadayata wahalwela inna lanka polawata pililayak wuna antha pahath niwata minissu. Mn mehema kiyanne English barikamata kiyala hithanawanam onama kenek enna wiwurtha sanwadekata man winadi deken mn oppukarala  pennanawa eyata English hariyatma ba kiyala. Eka nisa katai asanwarakamai kalakannikamai thibuna paliyata comments danna epa. Meka karunika illimak witharai. Hamotama theruwan saranai...!!!

replies.replyComment: @Karunaratne Wijeratne Valaththa nuugath pahath buruwa. Umba hithanawaada sudhan umbawage sakkily kiyala. Unmbe ammata kitapan kalisama galawsla  nidhiyaganin kiyala. Habai sudhdho umbalawage aya  gandahagahana Aya samaga langatawath enne naa. Sudhanda  unbata wadaa kochcgara vadhagath da? Umbawa hadu ammata thaggak  denna ohne. Umbalawage aya me ratata nindaawak.

Oyath  sarama andhalda inne?  Hamotama ohne  kalisan coat andhala kaditchcha ingreesi wath katha karanna. Eh ratawalvalata horen wath yanna. Ada higanno pawaa kalisam andhinawa. Bana bana eva agaya karanawa. Boru kiyanna epa. Aththa kathakaranna. P. Sirisena pawaa kalisam andhina welaawal   thiyenawa. Passapaththa sodanne nathuwata ape minidunta wada godak hondai. Mulu lokema athatha kathakarana aya meka dannawaa.
